title: Ridiculous.
body:
The punishment system is absolutely ridiculous. People can troll and feed a game all they want, and all they have to do is either not say anything, or feign innocence with something like "sorry guys :( lagging". But the moment I say something to the troll that could be considered rude? I get a chat restriction, I get a temp ban, etc.

Why is there not some sort of system that allows the mods to view a game's footage, so they can catch these trolls and punish them properly? Why are they allowed to do whatever they want, but I can't call someone a feeding b*tch, without getting banned?

I just got a 2 week temp ban for cussing a guy out because he was purposely feeding, running into towers, following me around in the jungle and messing with me, taking my jungle camps, etc. Yet nothing happened to him despite him ruining the match for my team. EVERYBODY in the enemy team was on his side, saying he was just having fun and I was in the wrong for cussing him out. Why is that okay? Do people not have balls anymore? Can nobody handle some cuss words when they're ruining everyone else's game?

replies.body: We do have systems for detecting intentional feeder, and they work pretty well. Just report the player for feeding after the game. Yelling at them isn't going to solve the problem, and is actually giving them exactly what they want.

what about the ones that dont say anythnig and dont feed but rather just dont do anything. afk lane farm. ping spam near a person/ follow said person around for no reason and steal their xp? what can you do about those kind of trolls

It's not like this happens very often. 
In my 4k + games I never had a guy who trolled this way.
Not worth thinking about something that happens this rarely.

And splitpushing ("afk lane farm") isn't punishable. 
Btw. if somebody is doing this, nobody hold you back to just join him. So it's a 5 v 5 again. (most of the time they just don't know it better and think it's a good idea to splitpush)
